RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 300 Y Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Purse 6300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGISTERIAL broke in, drifted in, driving. PIECE OF CALICO no match for winner. PRIMEROINDIOAZOOM chased top two. TAKEMETOTHECANDYSHOP game effort. MIDNIGHT SECRET late try. A MINI SECRET alter path early. MOONIN ENCORE mid pack. SAJ SIMPLY VALENTINE no factor. POLITICAL GIFT lost path early, veered in. LOVEY veered out sharply. A JOCKEY OBJECTION WAS POSTED, THE JOCKEY OF A MINI SECRET CLAIMED FOUL AGAINST THE JOCKEY OF MAGISTERIAL FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE AT THE START, AFTER A STEWARDS REVIEW THE CLAIM OF FOUL WAS DISALLOWED AND NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 5000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $2,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $3,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OLIVIAN sprinted to a clear lead and edged away in the stretch to prove best. MY MEADOW was off the pace on the inside but was no match for the winner. DONNAS FINAL WORD was forwardly placed in the two path, dueled around the turn inside of TOTHEMOONANDBACK then moved to the inside rail and was best of the rest. TOTHEMOONANDBACK was off the pace in the three path, dueled around the turn outside of DONNAS FINAL WORD and tired in mid stretch. OUT OF THE SKY hopped at the start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: My Meadow
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside, no match winner

ENTRY.NAME: Donnas Final Word
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, dueled turn, rail bid stretch, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Tothemoonandback
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, dueled turn, tired late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 7600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RACHIE RACH was reluctant to load, roused to the lead and pulled away on the turn, kept to task in the drive. JUST REMEMBER was forwardly placed while racing three or four wide into the stretch, gave a late run to be second best. PALM COURT had no speed through the turn then made a late mid track rally to be up for the show. RAGING LADY vied for the early lead then dueled outside of ALWAYS A TIZ in the middle of the pack and faded. ALWAYS A TIZ prompted the early pace from the two path then dueled inside of RAGING LADY in the middle of the pack and faded. PEGGY B FAST saved ground to no avail.

ENTRY.NAME: Rachie Rach
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load, roused to lead, pulled away, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Peggy B Fast
ENTRY.OWNER: Rust Terri and Henderson Charles C

ENTRY.NAME: Always a Tiz
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted early pace, dueled, middle of pack, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Raging Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, dueled, middle of pack, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Just Remember
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly, 3-4w turn, late run, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 6000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $3,500. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WEBCAM stalked the pace to mid turn then was coaxed at the five sixteenths and slipped through at the quarter pole and drew off. DOCS CARO CAT was rushed up to share the command to mid stretch then fought gamely to hold on for the place. DEL ARGENT was forwardly placed from three wide and was coaxed at the five sixteenths to engage the leaders at the quarter pole, fought gamely down the stretch to be up for the show. FRISCO KID trailed the field through the turn then moved out to five wide in upper stretch and gave a late run to improve position but just missed the show. ROUGE SUNSET sprinted away to share command to the quarter pole and gave way grudgingly. NORTHRNDANCRSGHOST tracked the leaders from four wide on the backstretch, fell back around the turn and was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Docs Caro Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed up, shared command, gamely, held place

ENTRY.NAME: Webcam
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, coaxed 5/16, slip thru 1/4, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Del Argent
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, coaxed 5/16, engaged 1/4, gamely, up show

ENTRY.NAME: Northrndancrsghost
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, 4w, fell back, no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 6600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF THREE RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOVELY LOLA pressed the pace from the two path to the three sixteenths and engaged the leader at the quarter pole, took command at the eighth pole and drew off. MANDONA went to the front to set a pressured pace to the quarter pole and was headed, matched strides with LOVELY LOLA to the quarter pole and weakened but was able to hold on for the place. HERE AND VOW tracked the leaders from three wide and proved best of others. HOT LIL MESS raced in the middle of the pack on the backstretch then made a mild bid on the turn and passed tiring rivals in the stretch. AMBER WAVES saved ground but never made a serious bid. GEORGIANO was off the pace from four wide to the top of the stretch and tired. EYEJUST TOOKCHARGE was not a threat and was always back. CAROLYN'S WAY remained back.

ENTRY.NAME: Lovely Lola
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, engaged 1/4, took command 1/8, drew off,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Glencrest Farm, LLC, Greathouse Equine,LLC & Fox Straus KY

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Lil Mess
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, mild bid, passed tiring rivals,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 72. Allowance Purse 12100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD NON WINNERS OF TWO RACES LIFETIME. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG JACK vied for the lead from between horses to the turn then dropped back slightly, made a rebid at the three sixteenths pole and ran down the leader to be up in the final jump. LOCO LUNA went to the front to set a pressured pace, was challenged in the stretch and fought gamely but was nailed in the final jump. TREASURE COAST tracked the leaders around the turn then moved out to four wide in upper stretch and passed tiring rivals. RIGHT TO SUE vied for the lead from three wide to the top of the stretch and gave way. ABRIERWIN saved ground to no avail. UNSTOPPABLE ME remained back.

ENTRY.NAME: Loco Luna
ENTRY.OWNER: K Bar K Enterprises and MCM Stables LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Big Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, rebid 3/16, ran down leader, up final jump

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CTBA Derby ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 77. Stakes Purse 34548. PURSE $34,548. Three year old Colorado Bred colts and geldings. Weight 122 lbs. Nominations contact CTBA.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHEELER DEALER was off the pace from three wide down the backstretch then made a bid at the five sixteenths pole to engage the leader nearing the three sixteenths pole and drove past to clear late. LUCYS MAJOR MIRCLE prompted the pace from the two path down the backstretch then engaged the leader at the three furlong marker and led at the five sixteenths pole then was caught nearing the eighth pole and gave way grudgingly. HOLY MISSION tracked the leaders down the backstretch from the middle of the pack, made a mild rail bid going into the turn but was empty and passed tired one in the stretch. GUTFIELD was hustled to the front to set the pace for a half and tired. YOU'RE MY ROCK raced near the back and was never a threat. CAN DANZER had an awkward start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, middle of pack, mild bid, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Gutfield
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled to lead, set pace for 1/2, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Can Danzer
ENTRY.OWNER: Rushton Stacey Eskew Stuart and Alfrey Vance

ENTRY.NAME: Lucys Major Mircle
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, engaged 3/8, led btwn calls, grudgngly

ENTRY.NAME: Wheeler Dealer
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, 3w5/16, engaged 3/16, drove past, cleared late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 86. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 7600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5000 OR LESS IN 2022-2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8000 OR COLORADO BRED CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WAGER NO MO stalked the pace from the inside to mid turn then tipped out to split horses nearing the quarter pole, took command and drew off. BULLAWAY tracked the leaders to the turn then angled out to three wide at the five sixteenths pole but was no match for the winner and proved second best. OREGON COUNTY hustled to the front for a pressured lead in the early stages, inched away into the turn but was headed nearing the quarter pole and was empty in the stretech. COWBOY DON passed tiring rivals. GOOSE DRANK WINE pressed the pace from the two path for a half and tired. JU JU GUY was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Bullaway
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, angled out 3w, no match, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Wager No Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, split horses, took command, drew off,
